oracle text:
10/10
Indestructible, hexproof

When Cthulu, the Ancient One enters the battlefield or attacks, each opponent mills twenty cards. Then, for each creature card put into an opponent's graveyard this way, you may return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

{sacrifice ten Eldrazi Scions: Return Cthulu, the Ancient One to its owner's hand. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.}
